resources.string: Future Business Leaders of America (FBLA) is a student-led nationwide organization preparing students with careers in business and many other fields. Students learn values in leadership by holding offices at chapter, state, and national levels. \n\n In addition, students can compete at regional, state, and national conferences where they use their knowledge in business, finance, and other career-oriented fields to win trophies and cash. FBLA also promotes community service as it is partnered with the March of Dimes.
Bug reporting features are accessible by shaking your phone on any page in the app.
